metadata.description: From the Shuster award winning creators of "Least I Could Do" and "Gutters" comes a loving nod to classic fantasy novels that manages to flip the genre on it's head. Unlikely heros cut a swath through a fantasy world that is extremely familiar and yet very different. A naive elven hunter makes an strange friend in an undead warlock and the two manage to make both enemies and friends as they fight the good fight against the Legaran Empire.
metadata.name: Looking For Group
